ch.iserver.ace.algorithm
Interface VectorTime

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable, Timestamp
All Known Implementing Classes:
JupiterVectorTime
public interface VectorTime
extends Timestamp

Vector time is a concept used in almost all OT algorithms to determine causality relations of operations.
